00049 template< class T >
00050 class Format {
00051 public:
00053     static QString toString( const T & value )
00054     {
00055         Q_UNUSED( value )
00056 
00057         return QString();
00058     }
00059 
00061     static T fromString( const ParserInfo & info, const QString & value )
00062     {
00063         Q_UNUSED( info )
00064         Q_UNUSED( value )
00065 
00066         return T();
00067     }
00068 }; // class Format
00069 
00070 
00071 template<>
00072 class Format< int > {
00073 public:
00075     static QString toString( const int & value )
00076     {
00077         return QString::number( value );
00078     }
00079 
00081     static int fromString( const ParserInfo & info, const QString & value )
00082     {
00083         bool ok = false;
00084         int result = value.toInt( &ok );
00085 
00086         if( !ok )
00087             throw Exception( QString( "Invalid value: \"%1\". "
00088                 "In file \"%2\" on line %3." )
00089                     .arg( value )
00090                     .arg( info.fileName() )
00091                     .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00092         else
00093             return result;
00094     }
00095 }; // class Format< int >
00096

00266         return value;

00278 
00279 static const QString c_on = QLatin1String( "on" );
00280 static const QString c_off = QLatin1String( "off" );
00281 static const QString c_true = QLatin1String( "true" );
00282 static const QString c_false = QLatin1String( "false" );
00283 static const QString c_1 = QLatin1String( "1" );
00284 static const QString c_0 = QLatin1String( "0" );
00285 
00286 template<>
00287 class Format< bool > {
00288 public:
00290     static QString toString( const bool & value )
00291     {
00292         return ( value ? QLatin1String( "true" ) : QLatin1String( "false" ) );
00293     }
00294 
00296     static bool fromString( const ParserInfo & info, const QString & value )
00297     {
00298         if( value == c_on || value == c_true || value == c_1 )
00299             return true;
00300         else if( value == c_off || value == c_false || value == c_0 )
00301             return false;
00302         else
00303             throw Exception( QString( "Invalid value: \"%1\". "
00304                 "In file \"%2\" on line %3." )
00305                     .arg( value )
00306                     .arg( info.fileName() )
00307                     .arg( info.lineNumber() ) );
00308     }
00309 }; // class Format< double >
